plugin.title: Captions
plugin.compatibility: Compatible with 4.2; controlbar button works from 4.3; back/fontsize/state flashvars work from 4.4; dock button works from 4.5
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This plugin plays closed captions with a video. For the 4.3 player or higher, the plugin will place a button in the controlbar. For the 4.5 button or higher, the plugin can also place a button in the dock.

flashvar.name: back
flashvar.description: Set this to "true" to show a semitransparent backdrop that makes the captions more readable.

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: Location of the captions in (TimedText or SRT format) to display.

flashvar.name: fontsize
flashvar.description: Size of the captions font. Default is 14. The captions scale automatically, but this flashvar can be used to enlarge/shrink the baseline.

flashvar.name: state
flashvar.description: Set this to false to turn off the captions by default.
